INFORMATION THAT ACCOMPANIES OFFERING
"MUSIC FOR THE CONNOISSEUR* with David Randolph
Series 51 - 3 -
"Music for the Connoisseur* is a unique musical program0 It
is planned and executed by David Randolph, director of the Randolph
singers and lecturer on music appreciation at New fork University*
The present series consists of thirteen hour-long programs0
Mr* Randolph specializes in "music off the beaten path*. The
music is both live and recorded,. There will be music that is rarely
heard, or he will present aspects of well-known music that are less
familiar« The real charm of the program is in Mr, Randolph’s pene¬
trating discussions of music, composers, instruments and other musical
lore
It might be added for the benefit of those stations not yet
familiar with this program, that the previous series elicited more
favorable comment and correspondence than any other program offered,
with one exception0
In short, those of you who have not yet carried it, we highly
recommend this series0
